review:
猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，
可是我不会再要它了
。

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

如何在不下载游戏的情况下愉快的打差评
评测条件：通过挂时长软件添加游戏累计6分钟即可

PC端：
watt toolkit（原steam++）
ASF
SAM

移动端：
云挂卡APP
如何从库中移除游戏
主页 > 帐户 > 许可和产品序列号激活：点击移除即可
或者
客服 >> 我想从帐户中移除这款游戏

来点客观评价
暴雪、考迪克死一死的话估计无数人在刷了，总要谈点客观的，不然会有些自觉中立的人说点未经他人苦，却劝他人善的风凉话

先说公事：
停更几年，画了N年大饼的守望先锋2就是这玩意？改动还没个版本更新大，这些年员工都在忙什么？办公室性骚扰？看看当年守望2预告CG动画里老玩家的弹幕，现今看来只有2个字：心寒。逼肝骗氪就不说了，反正暴雪现在也就只会这个，我的战役模式呢？信誓旦旦的PVE一拖再拖，张口就是为了玩家更好的体验这些晦涩难懂的词。

再聊私事：
账号承载着老玩家的青春回忆，见证了和朋友一起欢笑犯糗的时光。你说没就没，这就是您说的为了玩家？向钱看嘛，不寒掺，哪怕您站直了脊梁骨，说几句真话，我对您的鄙夷也能少那么几分，来洗的暴白也会多一点。中国玩家不重要，但中国玩家的真金白银很重要。


新玩家的避坑理由
在这里，你能感受到如同上班一样的游玩快感
在这里，你会发现皮肤出的比版本更新更加勤快
在这里，你可以体会到原汁原味的正宗暴雪式傲慢
在这里，你能够看到无数新的承诺簇拥出的艰难决定
在这里，你将游玩一个拒绝中国市场和中国玩家的高贵洋产，玩之前，先低头再折腰。

结语：
再不刷差评，我可要给三国杀打好评了哦

does their corporate managers even know that steam allows reviews?

This might hands down be the worst game I have ever had the displeasure of playing. If I could go back in time to tell my younger self one thing, it would be to save myself and my wallet from this mind numbing experience. Maybe if blizzard spent less time harassing women and more time fixing their god awful game, overwatch 2 wouldn't have gotten review bombed five minutes into launch.

Edit: After a few more games, all my gripes with blizzard and overwatch 2 have been cemented. I don't know who at blizzard thought giving a dps a secondary heal counts as a support. It just baffles me on the decisions this company chooses to make, blizzard cant make a balanced character to save their lives, not to mention the "PvE" they are choosing to sell. blizzard cant even give players these "story missions" after they pay for them. A long awaited transition to steam which still manage to disappoint the lowest possible expectations a fan base has for a game. blizzard could have a literal money printer if they treated their player base with any sort of human decency instead of spitting in their food and expecting a tip. I hope blizzard will be happy with themselves after they inevitably kill overwatch for scraps of what they could have made. This game is only alive because of its dedicated fan base, and it seems blizzard is doing everything in their power to stop that. overwatch will become a glimpse in peoples memories as a faded joke and its all because of those mouth breathing lizards that control blizzard. This game had so much potential and yet it delivered nothing, it is a mockery to the first game to call this a sequel.

Em entrevista polemica cedida ao site IGN Brasil, o youtuber Velberan, falou pela primeira vez, sobre seu relacionamento aberto com sua esposa. "É uma coisa que sempre me perguntam, eu e ela somos muito mais que um casal, somos amigos, eu tenho meus hobbies e ela os dela. Eu gosto de gravar nos finais de semana, ela gosta de sair pra balada com as amigas, pra mim é uma ótima combinação, tem vezes que ela fica dias fora, isso nem me aborrece, gosto de ver ela feliz. Quando ela esta fora fico sozinho "apreciando" minhas personagens favoritas de Street Fighter ♡ e quem cozinha em casa sou eu, por isso tive a idéia do canal Bom de Garfo, falando nisso até hoje não descobri um prato mais saboroso que minha esposa e todos que provaram deram 5 garfinhos (risos)"

守望先锋是我上高中之后买的第一款游戏，当时刚出的cg看的我热血沸腾，就为了那句这个世界需要更多的英雄，马上花了328买了预售，当时觉得挺贵的，随着时间的推移，游戏时间的累计才发现328花的是真的值，一点都不亏，遇到了好多好多有趣的朋友，认识了很多人，有着特别多有趣的事情和难忘的回忆，后来降到68元，我啥都没抱怨，那个时候姐夫还说我们不会锁组队职业，没过多久锁222了，我也没说啥，毕竟职业划分后体验会更好，再后来姐夫走了，守望免费了，游戏的环境急剧变差，很多朋友也逐渐转去其他的游戏，每次上线看着寥寥无几的在线好友很是沉默，最后守望说要停国服了，他停服前的最后一天是我觉得这两年好友在线人数最多的一次，老玩家数据没了，之前肝的皮肤，限定皮都没了，跟几个还玩的朋友转战亚服，一切都得从头开始打，后面游戏改的越来越垃圾我也不想玩了，就只有几个好友仍然坚持在玩，现在守望上架steam了，可是还是需要外服的账号，我们国服的数据呢？辛辛苦苦打出来的账号呢？我忍不住了，也不想忍了，我必须说点什么来发泄心中的不满，曾经的我真的很爱这游戏，但爱的是过去的守望，而不是现在!＂这个世界不需要守望先锋!＂
垃圾暴雪，老子的皮肤呢，东西呢，全都没了，明摆着欺负人是吧，垃圾游戏狗都不玩
一起玩魔兽和守望的同学去年癌症去世了，我和他全部的记忆都留在了那两个世界里，可是暴雪把我和他仅剩的回忆都带走了。心里有无数的苦说不出，暴雪你真是丧尽天良啊。

And its not 'free to play' - with each battle pass costing almost 10 pounds I've basically paid for overwatch 1 again already. This is a game that doesnt care about its players and is doing everything to milk money out of every little release of content. I would not recommend it to anyone, go play tf2 kids.

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
